Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Requiem of Spirit#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Morpha#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.
